dialogStrings:
Flower girl
“What happened?”
{CHOICE}You'd better get out of here
{CHOICE}Nothing…hey…

Flower girl
“Really?
I don't know what's going on,
but all right.”

{Cloud}
“…”
{CHOICE}Don't see many flowers around here
{CHOICE}Never mind

Flower girl
“Oh, these?
Do you like them?
They're only one gil.”

Flower girl
“Uh, excuse me, would you like
to buy some flowers?
They're only one gil.”
